Articles.Content: I think it would be quite cool if, after landing, I could taxi my plane to the SPH and enter it. Doing so would load the craft back into the build mode, allowing me to modify it.  This would not add any real gameplay per se, but I like the idea of being able to taxi right in for repairs rather than clicking the "recover craft" button.

I'd be fine with it just as an open hangar door, but I guess we do have that at the Island Base.  ...and it would have to be open on both sides to allow for drivethru.

Kerbal Konstructs might have such a thing already, I might have to look for one.
